name: Car Games ·
description:
Play Car Games for the ultimate car driving simulator experience. Feel the rush of driving fast super cars.

Car Games has the one thing that none of the top racing games offer: freedom.

Explore cities, discover shortcuts, and blaze trails. Or just stop at a traffic light - you know, for the fun of it.

FEATURES
- Free roam, drive anywhere and explore an open world
- Complete missions to earn huge rewards!
- Buy cars, upgrade them, collect them all!
- Push your car to it's limit by challenging the city boss to a race!
- Supports PS4 and Xbox controllers!
